Name: Summer Resort Mogul
About the game: Create a world-class getaway in Summer Resort Mogul! Start small with a couple of bungalows and a restaurant, and then add movie theaters, dance clubs, swimming pools and more to entertain your guests. Once money starts rolling in, make smart decisions with regard to workers and supplies, upgrade the buildings you own to make them even more profitable, and do a little marketing, and before you know it, your resort will be second to none! Begin building your dream vacation spot today! Key features: • Three stunning resort locations • 45 meticulously detailed levels • 12 buildings to build and upgrade • Gold, Silver and Bronze trophies • Interactive tutorial
